profile_summary:
Anand Baburajan is a technology-savvy professional with a strong background in computer programming, boasting expertise in an array of programming languages including Python, TypeScript, and JavaScript. As a skilled software engineer and innovative founder, he has navigated multiple technical domains, transforming ideas into reality through his exceptional coding skills and profound problem-solving abilities. His proficiency in leveraging modern technologies to craft scalable solutions has earned him a reputable position within the industry.

With a notable career spanning multiple stints as a Product Engineer at Frappe, a Software Engineer Intern at HackerRank, and a Google Summer of Code participant with LiberTEM, Anand Baburajan showcases a breadth of experience in software development. As a founder of multiple ventures including CQ2.co, Wordamour.com, and Samay.app, he has successfully steered various projects to fruition, further solidifying his capability as a visionary technical leader. His presence on platforms such as GitHub, where he is followed by 147 professionals and maintains 18 publicly accessible repositories, underscores his commitment to collaboration, knowledge sharing, and growth within the developer community.
